Text:
It doesn't matter how many people can get guns legally but too easily and murder so many people, Americans are too stupid to understand gun control.

But at least in this situation, they are only killing each other instead of invading other countries to murder their citizens.

Maybe eventually the Wal Mart greeters will hand out guns like they do stickers!
@zakimar - yeah, cause no mass murders by psychos with guns happen in places like Norway or such that strictly control guns, right?
Anders Breivik, Norway..  a year ago yesterday committed mass murder.  He killed 93 children.  Gun Control is just a very small part of the solution.
